plot: Three homeless teenagers brave Chicago winters, the pressures of high school, and life alone on the streets to build a brighter future.
title: The Homestretch
plot_es: Three homeless teenagers brave Chicago winters, the pressures of high school, and life alone on the streets to build a brighter future.
plot_en: Three homeless teenagers brave Chicago winters, the pressures of high school, and life alone on the streets to build a brighter future.
